snippet: The abduction of the lawyer, Razan Zeitouneh, came hours after relatives and colleagues of two Spanish journalists kidnapped by Islamists in September in northern Syria made their plight public.
abstract: Razan Zeitouneh, Syrian human rights lawyer, is abducted along with three colleagues in a suburb of Damascus by masked men; abduction comes hours after relatives and colleagues of 2 kidnapped Spanish journalists make their plight public; antigovernment activists accuse Islamist rebel faction that Zeitouneh had often criticized.

byline.contributor: Nick Cumming-Bruce contributed reporting from Geneva, Hwaida Saad from Beirut, and Raphael Minder from Madrid.

lead_paragraph: The abduction of the lawyer, Razan Zeitouneh, came hours after relatives and colleagues of two Spanish journalists kidnapped by Islamists in September in northern Syria made their plight public.

headline.main: Rights Lawyer Among 4 Abducted in Syria; 2 Journalists Are Also Being Held
headline.print_headline: Rights Lawyer Among 4 Abducted in Syria; 2 Journalists Are Also Being Held
